title: Lantern AI Career Assessment - Improved
description: Streamlined two-path career assessment for focused career guidance

questions.text: What is your current grade level and ZIP code?
How much education are you willing to pursue after high school?

options.label: Certificate or Trade School
options.description: 6 months to 2 years of specialized training

options.label: Associate Degree
options.description: 2-year college degree

options.label: Bachelor's Degree
options.description: 4-year university degree

options.label: Advanced Degree
options.description: Master's, PhD, or professional degree (6+ years)

questions.text: How clear are you about what you want to do for your career?

options.label: I have a clear idea of what I want to do
options.description: I know what career field interests me

options.label: I'm exploring different options
options.description: I have some ideas but want to learn more

options.label: I'm completely unsure
options.description: I don't know what career direction to take

questions.text: What type of work do you prefer to do?

options.label: Building, fixing, working with tools
options.description: Construction, plumbing, electrical work, heavy machinery maintenance

options.label: Creating designs for physical structures
options.description: Architecture, civil engineering, drafting, structural design

options.label: Working with numbers, data, or analysis
options.description: Accountants, financial analysts, data scientists, statisticians

options.label: Working with computers or technology
options.description: Software developers, IT specialists, cybersecurity, web design

options.label: Helping people through education/coaching
options.description: Teachers, counselors, trainers, tutors, coaches

options.label: Helping people improve their health
options.description: Nurses, medical practitioners, doctors, therapists

options.label: Rescuing/protecting people
options.description: Police officers, firefighters, EMTs, security personnel

options.label: Inventing or discovering new things
options.description: Researchers, scientists, engineers, inventors

options.label: Working with art and creative things
options.description: Photographers, artists, musicians, designers, writers

options.label: Unable to decide
options.description: I need help figuring out what type of work I'd enjoy

questions.text: Which subjects do you enjoy studying and how do you rate yourself in each?

subjects.label: Art/Creative
subjects.description: Visual arts, music, drama, creative writing

ratingScale.label: Excellent
ratingScale.description: I excel in this subject and really enjoy it

ratingScale.label: Good
ratingScale.description: I do well and generally like this subject

ratingScale.label: Average
ratingScale.description: I'm okay at this subject, neither love nor hate it

ratingScale.label: Struggling
ratingScale.description: This subject is challenging for me

ratingScale.label: Haven't Taken
ratingScale.description: I haven't taken this subject yet

questions.text: Since you have a clear career direction, what specific career or field interests you most?
questions.placeholder: Describe the specific career, job title, or field you're interested in pursuing...

questions.text: What traits best describe you? (Select all that apply)

options.label: Analytical
options.description: I like to break down problems and analyze data

options.label: Creative
options.description: I enjoy coming up with new ideas and artistic expression

options.label: Helpful
options.description: I like to help others and make a positive difference

options.label: Natural Leader
options.description: I often take charge and guide others

options.label: Detail-Oriented
options.description: I pay close attention to details and accuracy

options.label: Problem Solver
options.description: I enjoy figuring out solutions to challenges

options.label: Team Player
options.description: I work well with others and collaborate effectively

options.label: Independent
options.description: I prefer to work on my own and be self-directed

options.label: Good Communicator
options.description: I'm comfortable speaking and writing to others

options.label: Hands-On Learner
options.description: I learn best by doing and working with my hands

questions.text: How do you want to be remembered or make an impact in your career?
questions.placeholder: Describe the kind of impact you want to make, how you want to be remembered, or what legacy you want to leave through your work...

questions.text: Who inspires you and why? This could be someone you know personally, a public figure, or a fictional character.
questions.placeholder: Describe someone who inspires you and explain what about them motivates you or what qualities you admire...

questions.text: Are there any factors we should consider when suggesting careers? (Optional)
questions.placeholder: Physical limitations, family considerations, location preferences, financial constraints, or other factors that might affect your career choices...

pathB.name: Exploration Path
